CreateBroker.name: CreateBroker
CreateBroker.description: Grants permission to create a broker

CreateConfiguration.name: CreateConfiguration
CreateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create a new configuration for the specified configuration name. Amazon MQ uses the default configuration (the engine type and engine version)

CreateReplicaBroker.name: CreateReplicaBroker
CreateReplicaBroker.description: Grants permission to create a replica broker

CreateUser.name: CreateUser
CreateUser.description: Grants permission to create an ActiveMQ user

DeleteBroker.name: DeleteBroker
DeleteBroker.description: Grants permission to delete a broker

DeleteUser.name: DeleteUser
DeleteUser.description: Grants permission to delete an ActiveMQ user

DescribeBroker.name: DescribeBroker
DescribeBroker.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified broker

DescribeBrokerEngineTypes.name: DescribeBrokerEngineTypes
DescribeBrokerEngineTypes.description: Grants permission to return information about broker engines

DescribeBrokerInstanceOptions.name: DescribeBrokerInstanceOptions
DescribeBrokerInstanceOptions.description: Grants permission to return information about the broker instance options

DescribeConfiguration.name: DescribeConfiguration
DescribeConfiguration.description: Grants permission to return information about the specified configuration

DescribeConfigurationRevision.name: DescribeConfigurationRevision
DescribeConfigurationRevision.description: Grants permission to return the specified configuration revision for the specified configuration

DescribeUser.name: DescribeUser
DescribeUser.description: Grants permission to return information about an ActiveMQ user

ListBrokers.name: ListBrokers
ListBrokers.description: Grants permission to return a list of all brokers

ListConfigurationRevisions.name: ListConfigurationRevisions
ListConfigurationRevisions.description: Grants permission to return a list of all existing revisions for the specified configuration

ListConfigurations.name: ListConfigurations
ListConfigurations.description: Grants permission to return a list of all configurations

ListTags.name: ListTags
ListTags.description: Grants permission to return a list of tags

ListUsers.name: ListUsers
ListUsers.description: Grants permission to return a list of all ActiveMQ users

Promote.name: Promote
Promote.description: Grants permission to promote a broker

RebootBroker.name: RebootBroker
RebootBroker.description: Grants permission to reboot a broker

UpdateBroker.name: UpdateBroker
UpdateBroker.description: Grants permission to add a pending configuration change to a broker

UpdateConfiguration.name: UpdateConfiguration
UpdateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the specified configuration

UpdateUser.name: UpdateUser
UpdateUser.description: Grants permission to update the information for an ActiveMQ user
